name: Infested Duelist
description: The Infested Duelist is a humanoid with exceptional agility and a unique connection to toxins. It features a blend of powerful melee and ranged attacks, and its appearance suggests an unsettling infestation.
memorable: Its ability to emit a spore cloud creates a tactical advantage in combat, obscuring vision and hindering attackers.
goals: Typically seeks to outmaneuver opponents and exploit their weaknesses in battle.
relations: Often encountered with other toxic-affiliated creatures or in areas of biological corruption.
environment: Usually found in jungles or areas rich in nature, thriving where toxins are prevalent.
strengths: High Dexterity enables rapid attacks and effective evasion, while its unique abilities enhance its survivability and offensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain conditions despite having immunities, and has below average Strength, Constitution, and Intelligence.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack options combining bludgeoning and poison damage through Slam and Shortsword attacks, along with thorn shot ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Slam attack inflicts poison damage and can incapacitate targets.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 13, allowing for reasonable awareness of surroundings.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception, giving it enhanced awareness in its environment.
additional_information: Damage immunity to poison and resistance to acid damage.
Can completely avoid damage from area attacks with Evasion.
Regains footing quickly when knocked prone due to Plant-Powered Mobility.
Gains advantage on attack rolls against poisoned creatures with Parasite Sense.
Spore Cloud ability obscures the area when taking damage from ranged attacks.

creature that uses spores in battle tactics
